author: mehdi
msg: Amended error message to describe licensing restriction flag in font

author: chirino
msg: make sure we test durable subs against BDB too.

author: chirino
msg: Implemented more robust session closing log on queues and consumers so that when a queue or consumer is stopped, any inflight messages on it's session are drained and Nacked.

author: chirino
msg: Make the waiting_on variable be a callback function to avoid constructing the waiting on status string every time the wait status changes.  The string only needs to be constructed when the management APIs poll the status of the connection.

author: chirino
msg: Provide nicer consumer labels in the management interface.
